prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
Sudheer Geera 
Email:  sudheergeera312@gmail.com 	
Cell No: +91 6305686897
Professional Summary                                                                                                                                                                                          
Having total 5.2 Years of experience in IT Industry.
Relevant 4.5 years of experience in developing Web applications in .NET framework, ASP.NET Core, C# .NET, MVC, Web Api, Entity Framework, ADO.Net, Sql Server and good knowledge in React 18 and Angular12.
Good Knowledge on Azure functions, Azure Storage Accounts, Application Insights, Service Bus (Topics and Queues).
Experienced in using Open API tool Swagger and Postman for testing API’s
Good Knowledge on continuous integration, continuous delivery and continuous deployment using Azure DevOps stack.
Good exposure on SDLC and Agile methodologies.
Worked extensively on various ADO.NET objects to interact with databases such as SQL Connection Object, SQL Command Object, Data Reader, Dataset and Data Adapter.
Experience using Source Code Control Systems like TFS and Azure Dev-ops
Fast learner and easily adjustable for the new environments and can provide optimum solutions even in new technologies.
Professional Experience
Working as a Software Engineer at Air works India Engineering Pvt Ltd from August 2024 to Dec 2024.
Working as a Software Engineer at Dharani Info Technologies Pvt Ltd from March 2022 to May 2024.
Worked as an Associate Software Engineer at People Tech IT Consulting from Sep 2019 to Feb 2022.
Education Qualification
M.Tech   Bonam Venkata Chalamayya Engineering College in the year 2016.
B.Tech   Guntur Engineering College, Guntur in the year 2013
Technical Competencies	
		Programming Languages		: C#.Net.
Development Tools			: Visual Studio .NET  2015, 2017,2019,2022
Front End Skills	: HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React- 18	
Web Technologies	: Asp.net Core, ASP.Net, MVC, Entity Framework, Ado.Net. 
Databases				: SQL Server 
Web
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
